remarks: Negation of a finite sum.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumneg.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumneg.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumneg $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A -u B = -u sum_ k e. A B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
